categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The assault of U'Dray took place during the Galactic Civil War.

It was a relatively extensive series of operations, in which the "White Death" Scimitar assault wing was sent against Alliance positions on U'Dray. The series of missions took its toll on the pilots of the wing's TIE Bomber squadrons, necessitating their replacement with trainee pilots fresh from Victorious, who had never flown bombers before.

The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia establishes that the Alliance won victory at U'Dray. This is not established in the Imperial Sourcebook, where it is mentioned in an in-universe Scimitar assault wing document that describes the assault as "ongoing".
